name: server
comment-filip: The server.js location changed because we have now included client source files above .wasp/out/server/src.

scripts.start: npm run validate-env && node --enable-source-maps -r dotenv/config bundle/server.js
scripts.bundle-and-start: npm run bundle && npm run start
scripts.db-seed: npm run bundle && node --enable-source-maps -r dotenv/config bundle/dbSeed.js
scripts.start-production: npm run db-migrate-prod && NODE_ENV=production npm run start
